Pre-Game Insights: South Africa will be on cloud nine after they beat England and will be confident as they are playing once again at the Wankhede Stadium.
The strong batting lineup of South Africa will prove too much for Bangladesh therefore we tip them for the win.
The team winning the toss will look to bat first, set a formidable total and then put the pressure on the opposition.
South Africa are third on the log but have the best net run rate thanks to big wins over Australia and England.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa scored 399 runs at this ground in their last match so the pitch is an absolute belter for batsmen.
South Africa and Bangladesh have previously played each other 24 times in ODI matches. Of these 24 games, South Africa have won 18 whereas Bangladesh have come out victorious on 6 occasions.
Others: The Proteas bounced back with a great performance after their shock loss to the Netherlands while Bangladesh will be desperate to avoid four straight defeats which will almost certainly end their semi-final chances.
